archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0344
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a new customer, I want to be able to lease hardware through my Account Manager so that I can join Vodafone

properties.value: New, online, subs or subs & hardware outright

PLease explain outright in context of lease option. Who is the owner of a device? What type of leasing agreements do you have, when can you finish leasing agreement? can you replace device with newer one? Owned by VF. At the end of lease the costomer may buy the device. There is a partner responsible for leasing. Not only for mobile, but also other devices. The customer needs to see the device in Enterprise Portal to be able to buy addons or request a repair, return. In case a customer leaves VF there is a process to collect devices and debt. In case a customer stops paying, additionally there is an option to block a device.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
